Class DistributedLogServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.distributedlog.service.DistributedLogServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Object
implements org.apache.distributedlog.thrift.service.DistributedLogService.ServiceIface, FatalErrorHandler
    Implementation of distributedlog thrift service.

      • notifyFatalError

        public void notifyFatalError()
        Description copied from interface: FatalErrorHandler
        This method is invoked when an unrecoverable error has occurred and no progress can be made. It should implement a shutdown routine.
        Specified by:
        notifyFatalError in interface FatalErrorHandler
